page.title: 12A Day In the Life of ...
page.content: The afternoon usually starts of with finishing off any outstanding work from the morning.I do not much like going into the class in the afternoon, but I end up enjoying it.For the rest of the afternoon we do art,project work and physical education.At 2:15pm we have a break for fifeteen minutes. We go home at about 3:32pm.I like going into the playground after school,but I do not like walking home,or having a snack when I get home.When I am home I usualy watch televisionuntil about 5:30pm.I enjoy relaxing and watching television and I really love going swimming at 6:00pm. When I get home after swimming I have my supper.Then I have to go to bed which I do not like it does give me a chance to read though which is my greatest pleasure.I often sneek into my brothers room and tell him stories.
